description:
Okamato and Hazama are in America to observe a surgery by the much-renowned Dr. Risenberg. Okamoto runs into an old friend, Tiara, and meets her childhood friend and civil rights activist, Johnny. However, Johnny`s attacked by two African American men, and Tiara is caught in the crossfire...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 苦痛なき革命 その1
